sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import '../styles.css' import moment from 'moment'; import { Button } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import {Dimmer, Loader} from 'semantic-ui-react' const CardExampleCard = ({weatherData})=>(

{weatherData.name}

Day : {moment().format('dddd')}

{moment().format('LL')}

{weatherData.weather[0].main}

Temperature: {weatherData.main.temp} °C

Humidity: {weatherData.main.humidity} %

Sunrise: {new Date(weatherData.sys.sunrise*100).toLocaleTimeString('en-IN')}

Sunset: {new Date(weatherData.sys.sunset*100).toLocaleTimeString('en-IN')}

) export default CardExampleCard;
